xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/163676-A Thousand Clouds of Peace Fence the Sky, Love; Your Being Love Will Never End 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eN9hYydo4MzXsZElKs9PnlBAplg.jpg Gerardo, a 17-year old guy has just finished his relationship with Bruno and starts wandering hopeless through the streets of the city. In his wandering he's tortured by images: each masculine body he sees reminds him of his lover. Gerardo is determined to keep what's left of his dying love. The only comfort he has is a letter that Bruno left him with his boss. A Thousand Clouds of Peace Fence the Sky, Love; Your Being Love Will Never End
